item.title: Trump Asks Appeals Court to Freeze His New York Criminal Sentencing
item.description: President-elect Donald J. Trump is trying to expunge his conviction before he is inaugurated. He would be the first felon elected to the Oval Office.

item.title: 2 Bodies Found in JetBlue Plane’s Landing Gear at Fort Lauderdale Airport
item.description: A routine post-flight inspection revealed two bodies in the landing gear compartment of a JetBlue plane after a flight from New York on Monday, the ai...

item.title: Jean-Marie Le Pen, Rabble-Rousing Leader of French Far Right, Dies at 96
item.description: He ran unsuccessfully for the French presidency five times, riding waves of discontent and xenophobia as the leader of the National Front party.

item.title: Golden Globes Ratings Decline Slightly to 9.3 Million Viewers
item.description: The show on Sunday averaged 9.3 million viewers, down from 9.4 million the year before.

item.title: What Is the U.K. ‘Grooming Gang’ Scandal Seized On by Elon Musk?
item.description: The billionaire tech mogul has been posting on his social media platform about a decade-old child sex abuse scandal in Britain. Here’s what to know.
